message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer takes into account both the worth of the product and your perceived value for it. I look forward to your response.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, I'm looking to spend closer to $9,000. I think this price is fair considering the value to me and your desired selling price. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider your offer of $9,000. However, I need to ensure that I receive a fair return for my efforts and resources invested in the product. Therefore, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.
